control_attributes.control_description: The organization uses all-source intelligence analysis of suppliers and potential suppliers of the information system, system component, or information system service.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization establishes a process to address weaknesses or deficiencies in supply chain elements identified during independent or organizational assessments of such elements.

Control Statement: The organization uses all-source intelligence analysis of suppliers and potential suppliers of the information system, system component, or information system service.
